about_the_game:
(The minimum playable UI is in English with tool translation.
However, English support is not available at all. Please understand.
We would like to gradually make it easier to play in English!)

"Look over there, it's Sakuna, and she's starving! It's my time to shine!"
This is a fan-made puzzle game based on Sakuna: of Rice and Ruin, where you place contraptions on the board to deliver onigiri to Sakuna.
Go for it, Kokorowa!
There are no real-time elements, so you can play at your own pace and take your time.
The board is 100 levels full of stomach!

Game Rules

"When you click the 'Start　「始」' button, the clockwork soldiers on the board will begin to move straight forward."
The clockwork soldiers can change direction or jump using the mechanisms on the board!
Collect all the onigiri along the path and deliver them to Sakuna to succeed!



There are various mechanisms on the board.
Use the mechanisms that can change direction and move to guide the clockwork soldiers to collect the onigiri and deliver them to Sakuna.


We'll introduce you to the mechanisms gradually, but generally, you can start playing from the first level and learn about the mechanisms as you progress.
So, feel free to start playing right away!"

□---□---□---□---□---□---□---□---□---□---□---□---□---□
■Introduction to Mechanisms
・The clockwork soldiers

Our clockwork soldiers. Delivering onigiri to Sakuna!
There will also be levels where you can use multiple soldiers.

・Onigiri

White rice to fill Sakuna's belly. Rice is power! Let's gather them all and deliver!"

・Sakuna

Kokorowa's best friend, Sakuna! The destination for the clockwork soldiers.

・Directional Gear

When a clockwork soldier steps on it, it changes its facing direction according to the arrow.
Let's guide them towards the onigiri and Sakuna!

・Bounce Mushroom

When a clockwork soldier steps on it, it jumps forward by two squares in the direction it's moving.
Use it to avoid bombs or leap over gears you don't want to step on. It's quite handy!

・Bomb

When a clockwork soldier steps on it, it explodes.
If it explodes while carrying onigiri, it will result in failure.
Despite its danger, a carried bomb can destroy existing mechanisms.

・Moving Platform

This platform moves the clockwork soldier in the direction it's facing.
The direction of the clockwork soldier does not change.

・Teleportation Shrine

When a clockwork soldier steps on it, it teleports to another shrine.
　　
--------------------------------------------------
◆Mechanism Attributes
Some mechanisms come with attributes. Look out for the symbols and make use of them!

・Directional Change

This mechanism, marked with this symbol, changes direction by 90 degrees when clicked.

・Draggable

You can move its position by dragging it. Place it wherever you like!

・Single Use

Once a clockwork soldier steps on it, it breaks.

□---□---□---□---□---□---□---□---□---□---□---□---□---□
■Others

Kokorowa: Onigiri Delivery' is a fan game based on "Sakuna: of Rice and Ruin".
This game is not affiliated with Edelweiss, the creators of the original work. For any inquiries about this game, please contact desunoya.

Feel free to stream your gameplay of "Kokorowa: Onigiri Delivery".
If possible, please include the game's title and the store address in your description.
